Source: Increases your Spell Resistance by <<1>>.  This effect is doubled if you are afflicted with Burning, Chilled, or Concussed.  \n\nIncreases your Magicka Recovery by <<2>>.
Target: 마법 저항이 <<1>> 증가합니다. Burning, Chilled 혹은 Concussed 상태 이상에 걸리면, 이 효과가 두배가 됩니다.\n\n매지카 재생량이 <<2>> 증가합니다.

Source: Reduces the Magicka cost of your abilities by <<1>>.
